description:
From the office to the open road, the men's Bridger Jean is up for anything. Seriously, there's a reason why it's earned hundreds of 5-star reviews. Ready to find out why for yourself?

It starts with their signature performance stretch denim, which features organic cotton for both comfort and sustainability. Give the fabric a gentle pull and you'll quickly realize why it has "stretch" right there in the name. Ever gone camping in jeans before? You can now, if you feel so inclined.

Plus, it has that 5-pocket styling that's convenient and never goes out of trend, and a modern slim fit that looks good dressed up with a collared shirt and jacket or casual with a basic tee and sneakers. So the only thing left to ask now is: Which of these cool color options are you going to choose?
name: Prana Bridger Jeans, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Enzyme washed stretch blend denim twill - 8 oz
